title: Preparing for the Collapse of the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/3/17
itunes:title: Preparing for the Collapse of the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/3/17
description:
George Noory and researcher Glenn Rhoades discuss the importance of protecting the power grid from a collapse due to a terrorist attack or solar flares, and what families can do to survive when society collapses after the disaster.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
